description: Monitors Kubernetes clusters using Prometheus. Shows Namespace/Node level CPU Cores / Memory / Network IO and PVC usage of both aggregate pod sets and individual pods.

options.content: LSD Observe - Node & Namespace Details - Version 2.29

panels.description: Instant top5k over range seems to give a rough average over a certain time period - without instant rouge values appear. Compare with non-instant graph averages. Close enough.
panels.title: Top Pod MB/s Read
Top 5 Largest Memory request/usage disparity per namespace
Top 5 Largest CPU request/usage disparity per namespace

panels.description: Aggregate of all pod(s) in a specific set, e.g. statefulset.
panels.title: Pod sets CPU usage

title: Node & Namespace Details
